added: #2357 [Technical] Added unit tests to verify the administration of program managers.
#2141 The learning unit page shows the organization and the campus where the learning unit is organized.
#2404 The user can change the language of the user interface in the menu bar on the top.
#2249 The classes are shown associated to components in the learning unit page.
#2398 Exporting mandates in xls format.
#2447 Show dissertations for which the teacher has the role of president.
changed: #2411 The sub-type of the learning unit is shown only when the type of learning unit is `COURSE` or `INTERNSHIP`.
#2377 The visualization of assistants' files can be limited by a period of time.
#2425 [Technical] Added script to clean some offers that were synchronized by mistake.
#2424 [Technical] To improve the synchronization with external applications, the field `changed` is now updated every time a record is changed.
#2421 Allows ordering columns in the search result of scores responsibles.
#2284 [Technical] Improved the database model of the organizational structure.
#2438 Usability improvements in the learning unit page.
#2450 Showing students in alphabetic order in the creation of a dissertation.
#2401 Showing the organizational structure in a hierarchy of entities.
#2476 [Technical] entity_version serilizer now considers external_id field.
fixed: #2437 [Technical] Fixed the tests that were generating duplicated academic years.
#2415 Back to the top of the page after adding a new person as a program manager.
#2460 Fixed the search of scores responsible that was ignoring some entities.
#2462 Fixed several usability issues in the entity's page.
#2469 [Technical] The access to the management of program managers is not based on permission anymore.
#2463 Link to academic actors was pointing to the wrong page.
#2461 Removed phantom character from the spreadsheet that was blocking the import of the excel file.

changed: #2457 Improved search and filtering in the administration of exam_enrollment_history.

fixed: #2443 Fixed the case of loss of scores when a form is submitted without modifications.

added: #2148 Components of a learning unit can now be found in the learning unit page.
#2235 Tutors of a learning unit can now be found in the learning unit page.
#2152 The specifications of a learning unit can now be found in the learning unit page.
#2234 The pedagogical information of a learning unit can now be found in the learning unit page.
#2219 Created rest web service to create/update the organizational structure managed by an external application.
#2361 Added tutoring details in the reviewer assistant form.
#2140 The different titles of a learning unit can now be found in the learning unit page.
#2338 Added the possibility of showing a banner to indicate that a page is in experimental phase.
changed: #2280 Addressed the case when entity managers have the right to manage several entities in the management of program managers and score responsibles.
#2369 [Technical] Added fields to the table organization_address to help on the synchronization with external data sources.
#2316 [Technical] Cleaned the data after serious business rules changes that impacted the score responsibles.
#2359 [Technical] Adapted the table `organization` to be synchronized with external data sources.
#2396 [Technical] Prepared the table `entity_version` for synchronization with external data sources.
#2269 A reviewer cannot be deleted anymore, but only replaced.
#2351 Got rid of the field `title` in the table `offer`.
removed: #2340 [Technical] Removed the tables `learning_component` and `learning_class` because they didn't proved to be necessary.
fixed: #2384 [Technical] Errors when sending emails are now logged properly for better diagnoses.
#2393 [Technical] Renamed the field `acronym_learning_unit` to `prefix` in the `organization` table.
#2310 [Technical] Fix the internship allocation algorithm.
#2342 [Technical] Fixed the urls of the assistant module.
#2313 [Technical] Fixed bug in the menu of the reviewer in the assistant module.
#2345 [Technical] Fixed persistent logged error: IllegalCharacterError.
#2262 [Technical] Fixed persistent logged error: DoesNotExist: OfferProposition matching query does not exist.

added: #2373 [Technical] Added an action in the model tutor to include the selected tutors in the group tutors.
changed: #2339 Changed the error message when there is a problem to send emails after the score encoding, to make it more clear to the user.

added: #1836 [Technical] A new field was added in the student application table to store the reference number of the application.
#1844 An internship manager has the possibility of modifying the choices sent by a student in case of non mandatory internships.
#1847 An internship manager has the possibility to see the context that a medicine student will pass.
#1842 An internship manager is able to see the choices made for non mandatory internships in the profile of the student.
changed: #1735 [Technical] The models that are shared with osis-portal inherits from SerializableModel.
#1868 [Technical] Serialized the model internshipperiodplace to synchronize data with osis-portal.
#1834 [Technical] Code refactoring to improve the performance of scode encoding.
fixed: #1853 [Technical] Fixed bug in the pdf of score encoding after sharing the same code using osis-common.
#1859 Fixed the import of the xls file after detecting that it was not operational.
#1710 Fixed wrong value 'Absent' in ExamEnrollment.justification fields

added: #1427 It is now possible to upload a pdf File in the 'Assistant' application.
changed: #1711 Update reference to osis-common, to use the new serialisation model for initial migration script.

added: #1642 The right to submit scores doesn't depend on the function of the teacher anymore, but on a boolean condition.
#1621 Data is synchronized with external systems and now OSIS is informing users when was the last time data was injected and exported.
#1640 [Technical] Added the necessary entities to enable the new modules: teaching charges (charge de l'ensignement) and charge application (candidature en ligne).
#1678 The academic calendar is used to activate and deactivate the charge application for the teachers.
changed: #1639 [Technical] An existing entity, attribution, was moved from the base module to the attribution module.
#1648 [Technical] Improved an existing entity - attribution_charge - for better accommodating data from the legacy application.
#1659 [Technical] Reusing the same code to print the score encoding paper sheet in OSIS and OSIS-Portal
#1669 A better message was put in place to explain modifications in the address to be printed in the score encoding paper sheet.
#1622 Changed the order of score encoding justifications to better represent the logic of the business.
fixed: #1655 The error when the teacher encodes 'absent' but the application show 'unjustified absence' has been fixed.
#1624 The error when the user pressed enter to jump from a field to another in the online score encoding and the page was not scrolling has been fixed.
